          <title>
            <string language="de">Das Carl Peters-Denkmal in Hannover</string>
            <string language="en">The Carl-Peters monument in Hanover</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le monument de Karl-Peters à Hannovre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O monumento de Carl-Peters-Peters em Hanover</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il monumento del Carl-Peters-Peters a Hannover</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το μνημείο Carl- Peters στο Αννόβερο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El monumento de Carl-Peters-Peters en Hannover</string>
          </title>
          <language>de</language>
          <description>
            <string language="de">Abbildung des Carl Peters-Denkmal in Hannover, Beschreibung des Denkmals und Geschichte dieses Denkmals. Fragen zum Text und Rechercheauftrag für Einzelarbeit. Anregung zur Gruppenarbeit in der Klasse.</string>
            <string language="en">Picture of the Carl-Peters monument in Hanover, description and history. Questions on the text and research assignment for individual work. Invitation to groupwork in the class.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Kolonialismus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Ostafrika</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Peters, Carl</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">East Africa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Of Peter, Carl</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>1</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Image du monument de Karl-Peters à Hannovre, 
description et histoire. Questions sur l'affectation des textes 
et de recherches pour le travail individuel. Invitation au 
groupwork dans la classe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Retrato do monumento de Carl-Peters-Peters em 
Hanover, em descrição e em history. Perguntas na atribuição 
do texto e da pesquisa para o trabalho individual. Invitation ao
groupwork na classe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Immagine del monumento del Carl-Peters-Peters a 
Hannover, la descrizione e la storia. Domande sull'assegnazione 
di ricerca e del testo per lavoro specifico. Invito a groupwork 
nel codice categoria.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εικόνα του μνημείου Carl- Peters στο Αννόβερο, 
την περιγραφή και την ιστορία. Ερωτήσεις στην ανάθεση 
κειμένων και έρευνας για τη μεμονωμένη εργασία. Πρόσκληση 
στο groupwork στην κλάση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cuadro del monumento de Carl-Peters-Peters en 
Hannover, la descripción y la historia. Preguntas sobre la 
asignación del texto y de la investigación para el trabajo 
individual. Invitación al groupwork en la clase.</string>
          </description>
